name: Luka Coetzee on Cello with Jon Kimura Parker on Piano

location.name: Koerner Hall, Royal Conservatory of Music

description:
Witness the exceptional talents of RCM alumni Luka Coetzee and Jon Kimura Parker as they perform a delightful program including Omar Daniel: Duo for Violoncello and Piano, Johannes Brahms: Cello Sonata No. 2 in F Major, op. 99, George Gershwin: Three Preludes, and Sergei Rachmaninov: Cello Sonata in G Minor, op. 19.

Please join us! This concert is preceded by a short performance by talented students of The Royal Conservatory.
